code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{BACKEND_WS}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PracticeMode(){const[status,setStatus]=useState("Esperando...");const[socket,setSocket]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const ws=new WebSocket(BACKEND_WS);setSocket(ws);ws.onmessage=msg=>{const data=JSON.parse(msg.data);if(data.type==="result"){setStatus(data.correct?"✅ Correcto":"❌ Incorrecto");}};return()=>ws.close();},[]);const handleStart=()=>{socket===null||socket===void 0?void 0:socket.send(JSON.stringify({action:"start_practice"}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Modo pr\xE1ctica \u270B"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleStart,children:"Iniciar pr\xE1ctica"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:status})]});}export default PracticeMode;
